                <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                 <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/10/food-emojis-reproduced-in-real-life/">
                  Food Emojis Reproduced in Real Life
                 </a>
                </h4>
                <small class="post-info">
                 <span class="post-about">
                  <time datetime="2015-07-10T17:20:57+02:00" pubdate="">

               <div>
                <span class="post-categories">

                <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                 <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/june-2015-national-geographic-traveler-photo-contest/">
                  June 2015 National Geographic Traveler Photo Contest
                 </a>

                <h4 class="title-article ">
                 <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/09/aaron-onassis/">

           <li>
            <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-photography " id="post-690908">
             <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-photography" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/creative-fashion-sketches-with-food/">
              <picture class="img-responsive first">

           <li>
            <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-design " id="post-693878">
             <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-design" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/gigantic-ball-pool-in-museum/">
              <picture class="img-responsive first">
               <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/ballpoolmuseum1-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
               </source>
               <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/ballpoolmuseum1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
               </source>
               <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/ballpoolmuseum1-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
               </source>

          <ul>
           <li>
            <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-546895">
             <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-pop-culture" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/01/best-of-creative-tables-on-fubiz/">
              <picture class="img-responsive first">
               <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Best-of-Creative-Table-on-Fubiz_0-440x285.png" media="(min-width:1380px)">
               </source>
               <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Best-of-Creative-Table-on-Fubiz_0-320x207.png" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
               </source>

                  Il y a 5 jours

             <li>
              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-690463">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-pop-culture" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/movie-posters-that-spoil-the-end/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">
                 <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/spoilerpostercollection-0-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/spoilerpostercollection-0-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">

             <li>
              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-motion loop-video " id="post-694282">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-motion" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/10/make-a-child-cry-campaign/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">
                 <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/medecinsdumonde-1-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/medecinsdumonde-1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                 </source>

             </noscript>
            </picture>
            <div class="container-title">
             <div class="container-title-relative">
              <div>
               <p class="post-categories">
                <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/design/">
                 Design
                </a>
               </p>
               <h4 class="title-post">
                <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/cut-out-dress-sketches-completed-with-urban-scenes/">
                 Cut-Out Dress Sketches Completed With Urban Scenes
                </a>
               </h4>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="fold-corner">
             <div class="container-corner">
              <span class="top-corner" style="border-color:rgb(229,203,82);">
              </span>
              <span class="bottom-corner">
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="post-content" style="background-color: rgb(229,203,82);">
            <div class="right-content lb-excerpt hidden-xs">
             <p>
              Lartiste Shamekh Bluwi dessine des croquis et illustrations de mode, publis quotidiennement sur son Instagram. Parfois, il dcoupe lintrieur des patrons de vtements et juxtapose ses dessins sur le paysage, des...
             </p>
            </div>
            <div class="right-content lb-excerpt visible-xs">
             <p>
              Lartiste Shamekh Bluwi dessine des croquis et illustrations de mode, publis...
             </p>
            </div>
            <div class="left-content">
             <p class="post-about">
              <time datetime="2015-07-13T08:15:30+02:00" pubdate="">
               Il y a 2 jours
              </time>
             </p>
             <span class="number-share">
              <span class="icon-share">
              </span>
              175
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="fold-corner">
             <div class="container-corner">
              <span class="top-corner">
              </span>
              <span class="bottom-corner">
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </article>
          <!-- .post -->
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 hidden-sm hidden-xs">
         <div class="container-ad-600 gradient-grey-bloc">
          <div class="ad-300x600">
           <div class="content-bloc-advert" id="div-gpt-ad-side-1">
            <script type="text/javascript">
             jQuery(document).ready(function(e) {
                        
var list = jQuery.parseJSON(autoPromos);
var temp_key, keys = [];
for(temp_key in list) {
    if(list.hasOwnProperty(temp_key)) {
        keys.push(temp_key);
    }
}
var socialPromo = list[keys[Math.floor(Math.random() * keys.length)]];
if(!isMobile){
jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-side-1').html(''+
'&lt;a href="'+socialPromo.url+'" class="autopromo size-300x600" '+((socialPromo.url!='' &amp;&amp; socialPromo.url!='#') ? 'target="_blank"' : '')+'&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="overlay"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/'+socialPromo.filename+'.png"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="background"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/img-1.gif" class="image_1"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/img-2.gif" class="image_2"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/img-3.gif" class="image_3"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/img-4.gif" class="image_4"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
'&lt;/a&gt;'+
'').show();
}
                        jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-side-1').attr('id', 'div-gpt-ad-side-1-old');
                    });
            </script>
           </div>
          </div>

          <div class="content-bloc-advert" id="div-gpt-ad-inc-2">
           <script type="text/javascript">
            var list = jQuery.parseJSON(autoPromos);
var temp_key, keys = [];
for(temp_key in list) {
    if(list.hasOwnProperty(temp_key)) {
        keys.push(temp_key);
    }
}
var socialPromo = list[keys[Math.floor(Math.random() * keys.length)]];
if(!isMobile){
jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-inc-2').html(''+
'&lt;a href="'+socialPromo.url+'" class="autopromo size-970x250" '+((socialPromo.url!='' &amp;&amp; socialPromo.url!='#') ? 'target="_blank"' : '')+'&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="overlay"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/'+socialPromo.filename+'.png"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="background"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-1.gif" class="image_1"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-2.gif" class="image_2"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-3.gif" class="image_3"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-4.gif" class="image_4"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
'&lt;/a&gt;'+
'').show();
}
                    jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-inc-2').attr('id', 'div-gpt-ad-inc-2-old');
           </script>

var temp_key, keys = [];
for(temp_key in list) {
    if(list.hasOwnProperty(temp_key)) {
        keys.push(temp_key);
    }
}
var socialPromo = list[keys[Math.floor(Math.random() * keys.length)]];
if(!isMobile){
jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-side-2').html(''+
'&lt;a href="'+socialPromo.url+'" class="autopromo size-300x250" '+((socialPromo.url!='' &amp;&amp; socialPromo.url!='#') ? 'target="_blank"' : '')+'&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="overlay"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x250/'+socialPromo.filename+'.png"&gt;'+

            <p class="post-categories">
             <a class="waves-effect" href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/design/" style="background-color: rgba(229,203,82, 0.85); border-color: rgb(229,203,82);">

            <h4 class="title-article">
             The Art Of Clean Up
            </h4>
            <small class="post-info">
             <span class="post-about">

        <a class="item-picks" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/02/05/dancers-photography-by-ludovic-florent/">
         <div class="img-container">
          <picture class="img-responsive ">
           <source data-size="414x414" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Dancers-5-414x414.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
           </source>
           <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Dancers-5-414x414.jpg" alt="Dancers Photography by Ludovic Florent"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
           <!--[if IE 9 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Dancers-5-414x414.jpg" alt="Dancers Photography by Ludovic Florent"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

         </div>

   /* &lt;![CDATA[ */

  <script>
   fire_clrz_likez_js();
function fire_clrz_likez_js(){
	jQuery('.clrz_likez[rel!=""]').each(function(){

        var el = jQuery(this);

		if(!el.hasClass('clrz_likez_active')){
			el.addClass('clrz_likez_active');
		}else {
			return 0;
		}


	    var cookievalue = readCookie('clrz_likez'+el.attr('rel'));

        if(cookievalue=='1'){
            el.addClass('bookmarked');
            el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
        }

	    if(cookievalue == null || cookievalue == '' || el.hasClass('stoplike')){
	        el.addClass('cliquable');
	        if(el.innerHTML != '...')
	            el.data('old_value', el.innerHTML);
            var params = {'post_id':el.attr('rel')};
	        if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                params.action = 'remove';
            }
	        el.on('click',function(e){
                var params = {post_id:el.attr('rel')};
	            if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                    params.action = 'remove';
	            }
	            jQuery.ajax({
	                method: 'get',
	                url: 'http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/plugins/clrz_likez/likez.php',
	                noCache:true,
                    data:params,
                    beforeSend : function(){
	                    el.addClass('loading');
	                },
                    complete : function(response){

//	                    if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
//	                        var parentel = el.getParent();
//	                        while(!parentel.hasClass('loop-mini'))
//	                            parentel = parentel.getParent();
//	                        parentel.getParent().destroy();
//	                        if($('nblikeaccount')){
//	                            $('nblikeaccount').set('html', $('nblikeaccount').get('html').toInt()-1);
//	                        }
//	                    }else{
//	                        if(response == '') response = el.data('old_value');
//	                        el.innerHTML = response;
//	                        el.removeEvents('click');
//	                        el.removeClass('//');
//	                    }
                        el.removeClass('loading');
                        el.addClass('bookmarked');
                        el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
	                }
	            });
                return false;
	        });
	    }else {
	        el.innerHTML = ''+cookievalue+'';
	    }
	});
}
  </script>
